segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the fried chicken is too hard to eat . I suggest you bring me another one free of charge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think you should go for our manger . I will call him here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will talk to him direcly .
segments.speaker: S2
